scripts.dev: concurrently "cd ./Frontend && npm run dev" "cd ./Backend && dotnet watch"
scripts.build: concurrently "cd ./Frontend && npm run build" "cd ./Backend && dotnet publish Backend.csproj -c Release /p:PublishProfile='./Properties/PublishProfiles/PublishProfile.pubxml'"
scripts.format: concurrently "cd ./Frontend && npm run format" "cd ./Backend && dotnet format Backend.sln"
scripts.deploy: (pwsh -command "Compress-Archive -Path ./Release/* -DestinationPath release.zip -force") && az webapp deployment source config-zip --resource-group rg-openai-ui --name openai-ui --src release.zip
